definition: of or relating to the language or culture of the Yuma people, a Native American tribal person living in southern California or western Arizona
details:
adjective
- of or relating to the language or culture of the Yuma people
= example: of or relating to the language or culture of the Yuma people
noun
- a Native American tribal person living in southern California or western Arizona
= example: a Native American tribal person living in southern California or western Arizona
